com.team08storyapp

Class MultimediaController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team08storyapp.MultimediaController

  • public class MultimediaController
extends java.lang.Object
    +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ++++++ This class is used for future implementations (Fake Class)++++++ +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ MultimediaController is a controller class that is responsible for resizing (if needed), saving multimedia and update the current story and current story fragment.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei
